definition: abbr. for 印度支那[Yin4 du4 zhi1 na4]
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
surname Zhi
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
Indochina (abbr. for colonial term 印度支那半島|印度支那半岛[Yin4 du4 zhi1 na4 Ban4 dao3])/now written 中南半島|中南半岛[Zhong1 nan2 Ban4 dao3]
Indo-Chinese epoch (geology)/Indosinian orogeny
(bird species of China) Indochinese green magpie (Cissa hypoleuca)

sentences.english: Through the comparison of sequence, there was Tianquan paleo-uplift of Indo-Chinese epoch.
sentences.chinese: 通過層序對比，發現印支期的天全古隆起的存在。

sentences.english: Wenquan molybdenum deposit is a porphyry type mineral deposit related with Indosinian granite.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉鉬礦是與印支期花崗岩有關的斑岩型鉬礦牀。

sentences.english: The displacement tookplace in the period of Indo-China movement and the emplacement in Himalayan period.
sentences.chinese: 位移時期在印支期，侵位和暴露於喜馬拉雅期。

sentences.english: Then the Indosinian Block moved northward and amalgamated with North Vietnam Block in early Triassic.
sentences.chinese: 早三疊世印支地塊北移，和越北地塊會聚。

sentences.english: The ore bodies are located in the contact zone between Indo-China granodiorite and the Shifeng Group of Ordovician System.
sentences.chinese: 礦體產於印支期花崗閃長巖與上奧陶統石縫組接觸帶。

sentences.english: It is suggested that flexural flow facies is the main tectonic facies in the Yanshan area during the Indosinian movement.
sentences.chinese: 提出了本區印支期構造相以變流相爲主的觀點。

sentences.english: Uranium mineralizationoccured mialy during the early Yanshan epoch, and occasionaly during the late Indochineseepoch.
sentences.chinese: 鈾成礦主要在燕山早期，少量產於印支晚期。
